required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Anlotinib in Patients With Gastroenteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumor G3
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Group, Open Label, Multi-center Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib in Patients With Gastroenteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumor G3

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the primary effects and safety of Anlotinib in patients with Gastroenteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumor G3.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization，each 42 days up to progressive disease(PD) or death(up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: each 42 days up to intolerance the toxicity or PD (up to 24 months)
From randomization until death (up to 24 months)
each 42 days up to intolerance the toxicity or PD (up to 24 months)

intervention.description: Anlotinib is followed Day 1 to day 14 by 7 days off treatment in a 21-day cycle） and it should be continued until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent
